name: Cascade3D - Physics Simulator & Game
description:
Physics simulator and game based on a ball bearing elevator, bounce drums, and catch return tray.
Tinker in the simulator and alter gravity or the mess with the speed of time!
Add ball bearings, watch them bounce and click into the shiny plastic return tray!
Load it up and watch the mesmerizing show.

18 game play levels of increasing difficulty and varying challenges.
Move the bouncers or change gravity to bounce ball bearings into the catch tray in time!

Featuring shiny rendered plastic parts, realistic sound effects, and an addictive yet simple game play.

LifeStamp Games is very interested in any and all constructive feedback to help make our games better.

Future directions for Cascade3D include:
- Adding a moveable stop at the end of the ball bearing drop, just like the original Matchbox Cascade toy.
- Adding more brain teasing challenge levels, including 3D rotation of the elevator and drop point.
- Customization of the floor, background, & ball bearing material.
- Elevator sound effect, which could be turned off separately.
Inspired by the 1970’s Matchbox toy Cascade. Legal disclaimer: The original toy manufacturer Matchbox does not endorse Cascade3D.
